meanings.definition: Talk casually, especially about unimportant matters.
meanings.sent2: She loves to natter on the phone with her friends.
meanings.sent3: The birds nattered cheerfully in the trees.
meanings.sent4: The stream seemed to natter as it flowed over the rocks.
meanings.sent5: The old friends nattered away happily at the park.

meanings.sent1: Their natter could be heard across the room.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy a good natter with my coworkers during lunch.
meanings.sent3: The cat joined in the natter with a meow.
meanings.sent4: The gentle natter of the stream was soothing.
meanings.sent5: The lively natter of the children filled the playground.
